name: Slime Adventure
detailed_description:
We offer you to play an interesting platformer "Slime Adventure". During the adventure, Slime and his girlfriend decided to make a stop to take a break from long adventures. During sleep his girlfriend was kidnapped. Travel through levels, destroy monsters, pick up a good moment for a jump, jump over spikes, make your way through the water, jump on trampolines, look for keys to go further and find Slime's girlfriend. Collect stars to change the appearance of Slime, choose the skin you like: pirate, viking, ghost, new year and others. Challenge yourself by completing various achievements. For example, can you complete the game with only one life? You are waiting for 30 levels, many obstacles and monsters, puzzles.

- 30 levels.

- 15 skins.

- 7 achievements.

- Nice soundtrack.

- Hardcore mode with one life.

- Many different obstacles.
